about_the_game:
Master gravity (or crash trying) in Slingshot Pilot! Pull off risky maneuvers, dodge asteroids, and complete crazy missions to rank up in the corp, and get riskier and shadier assignments. Compete versus peers in the highscore chase but dont fly too close to the sun..

Navigate, Adapt, Survive

Take control of a nimble spaceship and weave through levels filled with shifting gravitational forces from planets and other celestial bodies. Each environment is dynamic and packed with hazards and obstacles. Planning ahead and split-second reactions are your lifelines, but don’t get too comfortable—crashing is all part of the learning curve - So is nailing that perfect gravity maneuver.

A Universe of Peril and Mystery

Navigate asteroid fields, lava planets, ice worlds, and gas giants. Rescue stranded pilots, evacuate survivors, and dodge ominous outsiders that seem to hunt you. Danger lurks everywhere—can you survive the chaos?

Achievements and Leaderboards

Going an extra mile, lending a helping hand endulging your curiosity is rewarded with achievements. Compete with friends and other players on leaderboards, cut corners and perfect your slingshot skills to leave rivals in your space dust.

Keyboard or Game Controller

Play with what you find more comfortable. This game is optimized for Keyboard + Mouse as well as Common Controllers and works naturally also on Steam Deck.
